name: Children's Hospital: PediaQuest
description:
A doctor sim game.  Heal children, and discharge them to earn money.  Upgrade the facility to help kids heal.  Built by using (read: misusing) a custom RPG engine built initially for JRPGs.  

You can also donate to support St. Louis CMN hospitals at :

https://www.extra-life.org/participant/Cheezyrock
